page.description: Returns the Index file extension that would be associated with the passed in Table extension.
page.original:
TABLE.GET_INDEX_EXTENSION() Syntax Extension as C = TABLE.GET_INDEX_EXTENSION( Table_Filename_Extension as C ) ArgumentDescription ExtensionThe filename extension that would be used for the table's index file. Table_Filename_ExtensionThe three character file type extension associated with any Alpha Anywhere table.
Description The TABLE.GET_INDEX_EXTENSION() method returns the extension of the associated index file for a particular Alpha Anywhere object type. Example ? table.get_index_extension(".dbf") -> ".cdx" ? table.get_index_extension(".ddd") -> ".ddx" ? table.get_index_extension(".alb") -> ".alx" ? table.get_index_extension(".set") -> ".sex"
See Also Table Functions and Methods, TABLE.GET_MEMO_EXTENSION()
